message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to us, we're considering a price of $14000. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire an item worth $12000 to you at a reasonable premium. We believe this is a fair offer that respects both our valuation and your perceived worth of the product. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12000 for it. I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
